# toolsHub.builders - Free AI Tools Directory

Access 50+ free AI tools for text, images, audio, video, and code. No sign-up required. Instant results. Built for students, creators, and developers.

toolsHub.builders is a free AI tools directory that provides instant access to powerful AI tools without requiring registration or payment. All tools run client-side for privacy, and new tools are added weekly based on user feedback.

## Website
https://toolshub.builders

## Key Pages

### Main Pages
- Home: https://toolshub.builders/
- All Tools: https://toolshub.builders/tools
- Text Tools: https://toolshub.builders/tools?category=text
- Image Tools: https://toolshub.builders/tools?category=image
- Audio Tools: https://toolshub.builders/tools?category=audio
- Video Tools: https://toolshub.builders/tools?category=video
- Code Tools: https://toolshub.builders/tools?category=code

### Popular Tools
- AI Summarizer: https://toolshub.builders/tools/ai-summarizer
- Background Remover: https://toolshub.builders/tools/background-remover
- Code Explainer: https://toolshub.builders/tools/code-explainer
- Grammar Checker: https://toolshub.builders/tools/grammar-checker
- Image Upscaler: https://toolshub.builders/tools/image-upscaler
- Text to Speech: https://toolshub.builders/tools/text-to-speech
- Video Compressor: https://toolshub.builders/tools/video-compressor

- Privacy Policy: https://toolshub.builders/privacy
- Terms of Service: https://toolshub.builders/terms

- Changelog: https://toolshub.builders/changelog
- Contact: mailto:hello@toolshub.builders

## Features
- 50+ Free AI Tools
- No Sign-up Required
- No Usage Limits
- Client-side Processing (Privacy-focused)
- Works on All Devices
- New Tools Added Weekly

## Categories
- Text Tools: Summarization, paraphrasing, grammar checking, text generation
- Image Tools: Background removal, upscaling, compression, generation
- Audio Tools: Text-to-speech, speech-to-text, voice cloning
- Video Tools: Compression, conversion, trimming
- Code Tools: Explanation, generation, formatting, conversion

## Target Audience
- Students needing homework help
- Content creators and marketers
- Developers and programmers
- Designers and creative professionals
- Anyone needing quick AI-powered assistance
